Title: The role of stress during memory reactivation on intrusive memories
Author: Cheung, Jessica; Garber, Benjamin; Bryant, Richard A.
ExperimentalCondition: Socially evaluated cold pressor test (SECPT) + reactivation
Step1_ExperimentalCondition: Cold water stress induction + trauma reminder
Step2_Individual_technique: Cold vs. Warm water stress + trauma reminder
ResultSummary: Stress/Reactivation condition had significantly more intrusive memories than the Reactivation
Level2_detailed: Cold vs. Warm water stress + trauma reminder

Title: The role of stress during memory reactivation on intrusive memories
Author: Cheung, Jessica; Garber, Benjamin; Bryant, Richard A.
ExperimentalCondition: Socially evaluated cold pressor test (SECPT) + reactivation
Step1_ExperimentalCondition: Cold water stress induction + trauma reminder
Step2_Individual_technique: Cold water stress induction + trauma reminder vs. Cold water stress induction
ResultSummary: Stress/Reactivation condition had significantly more intrusive memories than the Stress condition
Level2_detailed: Cold water stress induction + trauma reminder vs. Cold water stress induction

Title: Acute physical exercise in humans enhances reconsolidation of emotional memories
Author: Keyan, D., & Bryant, R. A.
Step2_Individual_technique: Trauma reminder + exercise vs. Trauma reminder
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of IES-R INTRUSION SUBSCALE
Level2_detailed: Trauma reminder + exercise vs. Trauma reminder
